abstract: police called after porsche crashes into pizza shop takeaway .
article: get daily updates directly to your inboxthank you for subscribing ! could not subscribe , try again laterinvalid emaila driver was injured after a sports car ploughed into an anfield takeaway . emergency services were called after a porsche boxster hit the shutters of the pizza shop on breck road . the takeaway was not open at the time . emergency services were called to the breck road and belmont road junction at 1.30 am on monday after the crash . the pizza shop , on the junction of breck road and belmont road in anfield . a porsche boxster crashed into the restaurant in the early hours of new year 's day the porsche had to be removed after hitting the front shutters of the restaurant , which was not seriously damaged in the incident .

breck road was closed off and the driver was taken to hospital with non-life-threatening injuries . merseyside police said no-one else was reported as being injured in the incident . this morning there was no clear damage to the outside of the takeaway , though a strand of police tape from the earlier road closure remained attached to a sign outside .
